title: The Spy Who Kissed Me
description: Isabel Stanley has been waiting years for a man to fall into her lap, but face first through the sunroof of her sister's Mercedes while dodging bullets was not what she had anticipated. Plunged into murder and intrigue by a stranger with blue eyes and a dimple, Isabel's hopelessly ordinary life unravels.Stolen military supplies and terrorism send Isabel on a wild race to save her own life and into the arms of CIA agent Kelvin Kapone. She trips over a dead body, is shot at, chased, nearly blown up, and has her first proposal interrupted by the SWAT team and her mother. Her safe, uneventful life is beginning to look very attractive.
author: Pauline Baird Jones
